## Workflow

``` d2

One Time: {
Github -> Account: create
Account -> Repo: create
Github -> Install "git"
}

One Time: {
RStudio -> New Blog Project:create
New Blog Project -> Note the Git Panel: "Git Panel"
RStudio -> Terminal
Terminal -> Associate Project with Github Repo: "Use commands from Github\n in RStudio Terminal"
Terminal -> Prepare Site: "quarto render\n quarto preview"
Prepare Site -> Git Panel: "commit all"
}

One Time: {
Netlify -> Login with Github
Netlify -> New Website
New Website -> From Github repo 
From Github repo -> Choose Repo: access {
  style.stroke-dash: 3
}
Choose Repo -> Choose Name for website 
Choose Name for website -> Specify folder: "\\_site"
Specify folder ->Deploy!!!
}
```

``` d2

Your Creative Coding Life: {RStudio -> Edit or Add Content: "*.qmd in \\posts"
Edit or Add Content -> Terminal: "quarto render\n quarto preview"
Terminal -> RStudio: "More changes"
RStudio -> Git Panel: "commit all files"
Git Panel -> Commit + Push: "Choose Commit Message"
Commit + Push -> RStudio: "Rinse and Repeat"
}
```
